original_text: Moses took the special gift from them and he burnt it on the altar. The smell of it while it was burning gave the Lord pleasure.
korean_text: 모세가 그것을 그들의 손에서 가져다가 제단 위에 있는 번제물 위에 불사르니 이는 향기로운 냄새를 위하여 드리는 위임식 제사로 여호와께 드리는 화제라

sentences.original_text: Moses took the special gift from them
and he burnt it on the altar
The smell of it while it was burning
